title: Blackwell, what typeface?
content:
Hi there   
   
Anyone know what typeface this is?   
   
Any help gratefully recieved.   
   
A ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515204051im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70997.jpg)
author: alecchin

comments.content:
Hello Alec,   
I think it's Myriad but with a white line around it.   
Or perhaps modified.   
P

Pieter,   
   
I think you are exactly right that it is Myriad with a white added stroke around it. This sample was made with Myriad Bold with a 1.2pt white stroke added (note how the k & w are distorted, just like the sample) for the top word, and Myriad Regular with a 2pt white stroke added for Publishing.   
   
 ![white-Stroked Myriad sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515204051im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/71011.gif)

What an ID! I had some thoughts about Myriad regarding this ID, but I wasn't bright enough to come up with the revolutionary "stroke theory" ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515204051im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
